catalog_info.title: The Standard Model
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Introductory relativistic field theory, at the level of Physics 253a.
catalog_info.description: The Standard Model of particle physics: theory and experimental implications. Topics include nonabelian gauge theory, spontaneous symmetry breaking, anomalies, the chiral Lagrangian, QCD and jets, collider physics and simulation, the Higgs at the LHC.
